sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import './About.css'; const About = () => { return (

About CertifyHub

CertifyHub is a central hub for skill validation designed to help learners and instructors achieve their goals. Our platform provides comprehensive tools to manage courses, track progress, and validate skills efficiently.

Core Features

  • üë§ User Profile Management: Manage bio, skills, and profile pictures.
  • üìö Course Management System: Instructors can create/edit courses and add modules.
  • üìñ Content Delivery System: Deliver PDFs, documents, and slides seamlessly.
  • ‚≠ê Course Reviews & Ratings: Users can rate and review courses after completion. Average ratings are displayed on course cards.
  • üìä Progress Tracking: Lessons auto-mark as completed; progress bars show completion per course/module.
  • üîç Search & Filter Courses: Search by title, category; filter by free/paid, popularity, latest, etc.
  • üí≥ Payment Gateway: Securely purchase courses.
  • üéì Certificates: Earn certificates upon course completion.
  • üë®‚Äçüè´ Instructor Dashboard: Manage created courses, track student progress, and view purchased courses.

Why CertifyHub?

CertifyHub combines learning, assessment, and certification in one platform, making it easier for learners to showcase skills and for instructors to share knowledge efficiently.

); }; export default About;
